org.jshack.java.soundengine

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jshack.java.soundengine.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    stores all sounds and controls them
    Since:
    v1.0
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Niklas Keller

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static void load(java.lang.String key,
        java.lang.String filename)
        loads a file from the filesystem
        Parameters:
        key - key to access the sound
        filename - filename passed to FileInputStream

      • play

        public static boolean play(java.lang.String key)
        starts to play a sound
        Parameters:
        key - key provided during load(String, String)
        Returns:
        true if sound is loaded, otherwise false

      • play

        public static boolean play(java.lang.String key,
           boolean loop)
        starts to play a sound
        Parameters:
        key - key provided during load(String, String)
        loop - true if sound should be looped, otherwise false
        Returns:
        true if sound is loaded, otherwise false

      • pause

        public static void pause(java.lang.String key,
         boolean pause)
        pause or unpause a sound
        Parameters:
        key - key provided during load(String, String)
        pause - if sound should be paused, true, if sound should be unpaused false

      • pauseAll

        public static void pauseAll(boolean pause)
        pause or unpause all sounds
        Parameters:
        pause - if sounds should be paused, true, if sounds should be unpaused false

      • stop

        public static void stop(java.lang.String key)
        stop sound if it's playing
        Parameters:
        key - key provided during load(String, String)

      • stopAll

        public static void stopAll()
        stop all sounds that're playing

      • setVolume

        public static void setVolume(java.lang.String key,
             float volume)
        set volume of a already playing sound
        Parameters:
        key - key provided during load(String, String)
        volume - volume level, between 1f (max) and .0f (min)
